page.title: 14N. Bransholme, facilities.
page.content:
The following survey involved the activities people used or wanted. % % {Male }21 {5-16 (yrs)} 8 {Female}79 {17-30 } 28 {31-60} 32 {60+ } 32 { {Use local } {Yes } 51 {facilities No} 49
Activities include football, swimming rugby and keep fit each cover about {10%,}fishing{5%,}other activities include:- golf, cricket, and fishing.
Most people{(65%)}felt that a shopping centre was needed most, followed by sports centre{(20%),}swimming pool {(18%)}and disco{(15%).}Others include roller and ice rinks, BMX track, cinema and adventure playground.
